projects.title: Part of Speech Tagger
projects.description: Post is a simple algorithm that was developed to tag a word in a sentence corresponding to its part of speech. The algorithm makes of a probabilistic approach along with some randomness, together which forms the basis of an algorithm called Gibbs Sampling.

projects.title: NoQ Job Portal
projects.description: NoQ is a tool which allows for both employers and students to skip the hassle seen in modern day career fairs, while effectively pairing up students with employees based on various factors.
